root_dir = "../../data/Subjects"
path_info<-lapply(c("schedule","physio","video"),function(dj){
  list_id <- list.dirs(path = root_dir,recursive = F,full.names = F)
  if(dj == "video") {
    pat = ".*.mp4"
  } else {
    pat = ".db"
  }
  do.call(rbind,lapply(list_id,function(idx){
    db_files<-list.files(file.path(root_dir,idx,dj),pattern = pat,full.names = T,recursive = F,include.dirs = F)
    if(length(db_files)>0){
      dx<-data.frame(subject_id=idx,file_path=db_files,stringsAsFactors = F)
      return(dx)
    } else {
      return(NULL)
    }
  }))
})
names(path_info) <- c("schedule","physio","video")

getwd()

Subject <- output$sample_info_df$ID

Avg_Objective_Percent_Correct_Feedback <- mean(output$subj_performance$abs_accurate_feed, na.rm= TRUE)
Avg_Objective_Percent_Correct_Feedback <- round(Avg_Objective_Percent_Correct_Feedback, digits = 4)
Avg_Experienced_Percent_Correct_No_Feedback <- mean(output$subj_performance$relative_accuracy_nofeed, na.rm= TRUE)
Avg_Experienced_Percent_Correct_No_Feedback <- round(Avg_Experienced_Percent_Correct_No_Feedback, digits = 4)
Avg_Experienced_Percent_Correct_Feedback <- mean(output$subj_performance$relative_accuracy_feed, na.rm= TRUE)
Avg_Experienced_Percent_Correct_Feedback <- round(Avg_Experienced_Percent_Correct_Feedback, digits = 4)
